title: Acetylbinankadsurin A Decreases Macrophage Glycolysis and Pro-Inflammatory Phenotype Polarization via Inhibiting HIF-1Î± to Alleviate Hepatic Fibrosis in Mice.
abstract: Hepatic fibrosis is a prevalent pathological process of chronic liver injury, which can progress to cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma, representing a major cause of mortality in patients with chronic liver disease.
